title: Gone with the Blastwave, Vol. 1
description: Nuclear war is here. The human race is finally killing itself, and the remaining three airmies - The Reds, the Blues, and the Yellows - are locked in a desperate battle over whatever is left of the planet.Follow the story of two soldiers of the Reds trying to cope in the ruthless, but darkly humorous world of Gone With The Blastwave.
author: Kimmo Lemetti
